title: Global Female Contraceptives Market 2015-2019 with Allergan, Merck, Pfizer & Teva Pharmaceutical Dominating
text:
RSS Navigation Links HOME >> MEDICINE >> TECHNOLOGY Global Female Contraceptives Market 2015-2019 with Allergan, Merck, Pfizer & Teva Pharmaceutical Dominating ... DUBLIN Oct. 23 2015 /- Resear...The global female contraceptive market to grow at a CAGR of 3.0% over ...The report Global Female Contraceptive Market 2015-2019 has been pre...New contraceptives methods such as subdermal progestin implants vagin... http://feeds.bio-medicine.org/latest-medical-technology Date:10/23/2015 
DUBLIN , Oct. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Research and Markets ( http://www.researchandmarkets.com/research/3phl9t/global_female ) has announced the addition of the "Global Female Contraceptives Market 2015-2019" report to their offering. 
The global female contraceptive market to grow at a CAGR of 3.0% over the period 2014-2019. 
The report, Global Female Contraceptive Market 2015-2019, has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report covers Americas, APAC, and EMEA; it also covers the landscape of the global female contraceptive market and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market. 
New contraceptives methods such as subdermal progestin implants, vaginal contraceptive rings, transdermal patches, and third-generation oral contraceptives are being increasing used by consumers. The market share for these methods is likely to increase during the forecast period, owing to their increased safety, convenience, and benefits. In addition, the development of MPTs that prevent both pregnancy and STIs are increasing. 
According to the report, the high demand for pills, the cheapest, easiest, and safest means of contraception, among individuals is driving the market. 
Further, the report states that societal norms related to intimacy are discouraging consumers from openly buying these products, thereby hindering market growth. 
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global female contraceptive market for the period 2015-2019. This report considers 2014 as the base year and provides data for the trailing 12 months. 
This report covers the following types of female contraceptive: Devices (IUDs, Sterilization, Subdermal contraceptive implants, Vaginal rings, Female condoms, Non-surgical permanent contraception, Contraceptive diaphragms, and Contraceptive sponges) Drugs (Birth control pills and Emergency pills)
